OpenWIS BOARD

The responsibilities of the Board are set out in Article 12.

Note that, as stated in Article 12.7, the OpenWIS Association shall always have three (3) Managing Directors, comprising a Chairperson, Vice-Chairperson and Treasurer who manage the day-to-day activities of the Association.

Board Representatives

  • Mr. DELL’ACQUA Mattéo, Météo France (Managing Director: Chairperson)
  • Mr. TANDY Jeremy, Met Office (Managing Director: Vice-Chairperson)
  • Mr. BENICHOU Patrick, Météo France International
  • Mr. QU Weiqing, Bureau of Meteorology
  • Mr. LEE Si Ryong, Korea Meteorological Administration

In support of the Board, Mrs. EDWARDS Emma (Met Office) is appointed as the Treasurer of the OpenWIS Association.
